Title: "Falungong" harms young people
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: Fourth sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows children and young victims of the cult.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
